#summary Digital Audio Filter Test Program WWAudioFilter
#labels Featured

= WWAudioFilter =

WWAudioFilter is my personal experiment program of digital audio filtering techniques.

= Functions available =

  * 16bit/24bit FLAC file read, 24bit FLAC file write
  * linear-phase FIR lowpass filter
  * Zero-order hold upsampler
  * FFT upsampler
  * Gain adjustment
  * 64-bit floating point filter processing
